links.title: Tesla updates Model 3 options and pricing, dual motor becomes cheaper, adds color, and more
links.description: Tesla made several changes to the Model 3 design studio today to add new options, change prices and more. The automaker has also changed some of the timelines for deliveries and it opened orders for dual motor and performance vehicles in Canada.

messages.body: $TSLA Tesla Model S Is So Safe It Broke the Crash-Testing Gear. ‚ÄúMay be the safest vehicle ever tested by the feds‚Äù https://www.wired.com/2013/08/tesla-model-s-crash-test/

links.title: The Tesla Model S Is So Safe It Broke the Crash-Testing Gear
links.description: The Tesla Model S may be the safest vehicle ever tested by the feds. So safe, in fact, that according to the automaker, the all-electric sedan broke the testing equipment at an independent commercial facility. Most cars get five stars in the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration's frontal crash protection test and four stars for side impact protection.

links.title: Tesla Could Miss Model 3 Target Again but Here's Why That May Not Matter
links.description: Death, taxes and Tesla Inc. ( TSLA) missing Model 3 production targets may be the only certainties in life. Goldman Sachs Group Inc. said in note on Tuesday, June 26, that once again it expects Tesla to miss its production target of 5,000 Model 3s per week.

links.title: Move over Telsa, this self-driving Volvo will let you sleep during your highway commute
links.description: Volvo wants its customers to know that your highway commute to and from work could soon include a nap, a meal or even the latest blockbuster. The Swedish automaker plans to offer a true self-driving car by 2021, Volvo Senior Vice President of Research & Development Henrik Green told automotive website Jalopnik on Wednesday.

links.title: Tesla opens up Model 3 invites to all remaining reservation holders
links.description: Elon Musk's giant tent has apparently paid off. Tesla announced Tuesday evening it will open up invites for all remaining Model 3 reservation holders to design and finalize their Model 3s. This applies to the US and Canada, and the invites will be sent out based on when holders placed their reservations.

links.title: Tesla Rallying to $500 Hinges on One Main Catalyst
links.description: Can Tesla Inc. ( TSLA) Rally to $500 per share? It sounds stupid and absurd at first glance, but it's not out of the question if certain pieces of the puzzle fall into place. The biggest piece of this puzzle hinges on the automaker's ability to produce 5,000 Model 3 cars per week by early July.
